# init(servers:)

**Initializer**

Initialize the `NEDNSSetting` object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(servers: [String])
```

## Parameters

- **servers**: An array of DNS server IP address strings. These IP addresses can be a mixture of IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

## Return Value

The initialized `NEDNSSettings` object.
title: init(servers:)
